description:
We got all 4 CEOS from these companies to reveal the secrets on how you can run a profitable business and sustainable brand.

  1. FASHION VALET - Malaysia's favourite online retailer. 203,000 followers on instagram.
  2. MODVIER - Malaysia's leading concept modest fashion store. 164,000 followers on instagram.
  3. DUCK - Malaysia's leading online luxury scarves. 85,200 followers on instagram.
  4. LOVE TO DRESS - Most revered brand amongst the urban Muslim women in Malaysia. 55,000 followers on instagram.

You will learn:

  1. The must-know branding tips of a fashion label from Vivy Yusof - Duck.
  2. The secrets of growing your social media account from Sarah Shahnor - Modvier
  3. The cheap and fast track road to sourcing quality manufacturers from Sumayyah - Love To Dress.
  4. How to be the sought after and preferred brand by retailers from Fadza Anuar - Fashion Valet.

Included in this course are video lectures, take home notes and worksheets to kick start your successful modest fashion brand!
title: Modest Fashion Industry: The What, Why and How
